TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 安装一个类，该类扩展 来实现服务。

span.span: Installs a class that extends to implement a service.

summary.span: 在安装服务应用程序时由安装实用工具调用该类。

span.span: This class is called by the install utility when installing a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确实适用于与其关联的服务。The does work specific to the service with which it is associated. 安装实用工具使用它将与服务关联的注册表值写入 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE \System\CurrentControlSet\Services 注册表项中的子项。It is used by the installation utility to write registry values associated with the service to a subkey within the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\System\CurrentControlSet\Services registry key. 服务由其在此子项中的 ServiceName 标识。The service is identified by its ServiceName within this subkey. 子项还包括服务所属的可执行文件或 .dll 的名称。The subkey also includes the name of the executable or .dll to which the service belongs. 若要安装服务，请创建一个从类继承的项目安装程序类 ，并将 类的特性设置为 `true` 。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from the class, and set the attribute on the class to `true`. 在项目中， 为每个服务应用程序创建一个实例，并 为应用程序中的每个服务创建一个实例。Within your project, create one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 在项目安装程序类构造函数中，使用和实例设置服务的安装 属性 ，并将实例添加到集合中 。Within your project installer class constructor, set the installation properties for the service using the and instances, and add the instances to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 建议使用构造函数来添加安装程序实例;但是，如果需要 在方法中将添加到集合中 ，请确保在方法中对集合执行相同的添加 。It is recommended that you use the constructor for adding installer instances; however, if you need to add to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. 对于从类派生的所有类 ，集合的状态 在和方法中必须相同 。For all classes deriving from the class, the state of the collection must be the same in the and methods. 但是， 如果将安装程序实例添加到 自定义安装程序类构造函数中的集合，则可以避免在和方法中维护集合。在调用安装实用程序时，它会查找 属性。However, you can avoid the maintenance of the collection across the and methods if you add installer instances to the collection in your custom installer class constructor.When the install utility is called, it looks for the attribute. 如果该属性为 `true` ，则实用工具将安装已添加到 集合中并与项目安装程序关联的所有服务。If the attribute is `true`, the utility installs all the services that were added to the collection that were associated with your project installer. 如果 为 `false` 或不存在，则安装实用工具会忽略项目安装程序。If is `false` or does not exist, the install utility ignores the project installer. 与项目安装类关联的将安装对项目中的所有实例都通用的信息 。The associated with your project installation class installs information common to all instances in the project. 如果此服务具有与安装项目中的其他服务分隔的任何内容，则此方法会安装该服务特定的信息。If this service has anything that separates it from the other services in the installation project, that service-specific information is installed by this method. > [!NOTE] > 与从派生的类的相同，这一点非常重要 。It is crucial that the be identical to the of the class you derived from . 通常情况下，服务的 属性的值在服务应用程序的可执行文件的主 ( # A1 函数内设置。Normally, the value of the property for the service is set within the Main() function of the service application's executable. 服务控制管理器使用 属性在此可执行文件中查找服务。The Service Control Manager uses the property to locate the service within this executable. 你可以在 将其添加到 项目安装程序的集合之前或之后修改的其他属性。You can modify other properties on the either before or after adding it to the collection of your project installer. 例如， 可以将服务设置为在重新启动时自动启动服务，或者要求用户手动启动该服务。For example, a service's may be set to start the service automatically at reboot or require a user to start the service manually. 通常情况下，你不会在 你的代码内调用方法; 通常仅由安装实用工具调用这些方法。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会 在安装过程中自动调用和方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 如有必要，它将通过 对所有以前安装的组件调用 (或) 来退出故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components. 安装实用工具调用 以删除对象。The installation utility calls to remove the object. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关已安装组件的信息 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息会持续更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information is continuously updated as the instance, and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify state information explicitly. 执行安装时，它会自动创建 以安装与派生类关联的事件日志源 。When the installation is performed, it automatically creates an to install the event log source associated with the derived class. 此源的属性由 构造函数设置到计算机的应用程序日志。The property for this source is set by the constructor to the computer's Application log. 当您设置 (的以使其与 服务) 的相同时，会 自动将设置为相同的值。When you set the of the (which should be identical to the of the service), the is automatically set to the same value. 在安装失败时，源的安装将与以前安装的服务一起回滚。In an installation failure, the source's installation is rolled-back along with previously installed services. 如果服务正在运行，则该 方法将尝试停止它。The method tries to stop the service if it is running. 无论是否成功，都 将撤消所做的更改 。Whether this succeeds or not, undoes the changes made by . 如果为事件日志记录创建了新源，则会删除该源。If a new source was created for event logging, the source is deleted. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为的项目安装程序， `MyProjectInstaller` 该程序从继承 。The following example creates a project installer, called `MyProjectInstaller`, which inherits from . 假设有一个服务可执行文件，其中包含两个服务： "Hello World Service 1" 和 "Hello World Service 2"。It is assumed there is a service executable that contains two services, "Hello-World Service 1" and "Hello-World Service 2". 在 (的构造函数中，该构造函数将 `MyProjectInstaller` 由安装实用工具) 调用，为 其中的每个服务创建对象，并为 可执行文件创建一个。Within the constructor for `MyProjectInstaller` (which would be called by the install utility), objects are created for each of these services, and a is created for the executable. 为了使安装实用工具识别 `MyProjectInstaller` 为有效的安装程序，该 特性设置为 `true` 。For the install utility to recognize `MyProjectInstaller` as a valid installer, the attribute is set to `true`. 在将安装程序添加到集合之前，在进程安装程序和服务安装程序上设置可选属性 。Optional properties are set on the process installer and the service installers before the installers are added to the collection. 当安装实用工具访问时 `MyProjectInstaller` ，通过对的调用添加到 集合中的对象 将依次安装。When the install utility accesses `MyProjectInstaller`, the objects added to the collection through a call to will be installed in turn. 在此过程中，安装程序将保留指示已安装的对象的状态信息，因此，如果发生安装失败，每个对象都可以依次备份。During the process, the installer maintains state information indicating which objects have been installed, so each can be backed out in turn, if an installation failure occurs. 通常，不会显式创建项目安装程序类的实例。Normally, you would not create an instance of your project installer class explicitly. 您将创建它并将 属性添加到语法中，但它是实际调用的安装实用工具，因而实例化类。You would create it and add the attribute to the syntax, but it is the install utility that actually calls, and therefore instantiates, the class. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要安装服务，请创建一个从类继承的项目安装程序类 ，并将 类的特性设置为 `true` 。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from the class, and set the attribute on the class to `true`. 在项目中， 为每个服务应用程序创建一个实例，并 为应用程序中的每个服务创建一个实例。Within your project, create one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 在项目安装程序类构造函数中，使用和实例设置服务的安装 属性 ，并将实例添加到集合中 。Within your project installer class constructor, set the installation properties for the service using the and instances, and add the instances to the collection. 构造函数会自动生成一个事件日志源 ，其属性设置为计算机的应用程序日志和 。The constructor automatically generates an event log source whose property is set to the computer's Application log, and an . 当您设置的 （它应该与服务的相同）时 ， 事件日志的属性将自动设置为相同的值。When you set the of the , which should be identical to the of the service, the property of the event log is automatically set to the same value. 如果安装失败，将自动删除该源。The source is deleted automatically in the case of an installation failure. 构造函数将 属性设置为， `ServiceStartMode.Manual` 以指定用户启动该服务。The constructor sets the property to `ServiceStartMode.Manual` to specify that a user start the service. 您可以将属性重置为， `ServiceStartMode.Automatic` 以指定服务在计算机重新启动时启动。You can reset the property to `ServiceStartMode.Automatic` to specify that the service start when the computer reboots.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

span.span: The from which to copy.

summary.span: 将来自 的一个实例的属性复制到此安装程序。

span.span: Copies properties from an instance of to this installer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在代码中很少会调用此方法。This method will rarely be called within your code. 通常由设计器调用。 is usually called only by designers. 将参数的服务名称保存 `component` 到实例的 。 saves the service name of the `component` parameter to the of the instance. (因为参数必须是派生自的类的实例 ，所以 `component` 保证具有 属性。 ) (Because the parameter must be an instance of a class that derives from , `component` is guaranteed to have a property.) > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用的是 Visual Studio 设计器，则当用户单击将 `Add Installer` 此类指定为其安装程序的组件时，将在设计时调用此方法。If you are using the Visual Studio designer, this method is called at design time when the user clicks `Add Installer` on a component that specified this class as its installer. 安装程序将从实时组件获取所有信息，并将其存储在安装时使用。The installer takes all information it can from the live component and stores it for use at install time.

exception.span: 正与该安装程序关联的组件并非从 继承。

span.span: The component you are associating with this installer does not inherit from .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DelayedAutoStart { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DelayedAutoStart : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应延迟启动该服务，直到运行其他自动启动的服务。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service should be delayed from starting until other automatically started services are running.

value.span: 若要延迟该服务的自动启动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to delay automatic start of the service; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该 属性可应用于任何服务，但会被忽略，除非服务的启动模式为 。The property can be applied to any service, but it is ignored unless the service's start mode is . 此设置将在系统下一次重新启动时生效。The setting takes effect the next time the system is restarted. 服务控制管理器不保证服务的特定开始时间。The Service Control Manager does not guarantee a specific start time for the service. 延迟的自动启动服务不能是加载顺序组的成员，但它可以依赖于另一台自动启动服务。A delayed automatic start service cannot be a member of a load ordering group, but it can depend on another automatic start service. 如果应用程序在加载之前调用延迟的自动启动服务，则调用失败。If an application calls a delayed automatic start service before it is loaded, the call fails. 在不支持延迟自动启动的操作系统上，设置此属性不起作用。On operating systems that do not support delayed automatic start, setting this property has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置服务的说明。

span.span: Gets or sets the description for the service.
The description of the service.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来描述已安装服务对用户的用途。Use the property to describe the purpose of the installed service to the user. 用户可以在显示已安装服务的详细信息的应用程序中查看服务说明。The user can view the service description in applications that display details for installed services. 例如，使用 Windows XP 时，可以使用服务控制命令行实用程序 ( # A0) 来查看服务说明，也可以在 "**计算机管理**" 控制台的 "**服务**" 节点中查看服务说明。For example, using Windows XP, you can view the service description with the Service Control command-line utility (Sc.exe) or you can view the service description within the **Services** node of the **Computer Management** console. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新的 Windows 服务应用程序的安装属性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new Windows service application. 该示例将设置服务名称以及显示名称和说明。The example sets the service name, along with the display name and description. 为服务分配安装属性后，该示例将 对象添加到 集合中。After assigning the installation properties for the service, the example adds the object to the collection. [!code-csharp[ServiceProcess_ServiceInstaller#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceProcess_serviceinstaller/CS/simpleserviceinstaller.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ServiceProcess_ServiceInstaller#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceProcess_serviceinstaller/VB/service1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DisplayName : string with get, set

summary.span: 指示向用户标识服务的友好名称。

span.span: Indicates the friendly name that identifies the service to the user.

value.span: 与服务关联的名称，常用于交互工具。

span.span: The name associated with the service, used frequently for interactive tools.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，在服务控制管理器中，用于为服务提供用户可读的描述性名称。The is used, for example, in the Service Control Manager to provide a user-readable descriptive name for the service. 是注册表值，但从不用作注册表项。The is a registry value, but is never used as a registry key. 因此，对属性值的限制不适 用于。Therefore, restrictions on the property value do not apply. 用作 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINES \System\CurrentControlSet\Services 注册表项，因此受到限制。 is used as the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINES\System\CurrentControlSet\Services registry key, so it is restricted. 显示名称永远不会由安装实用工具用来标识服务，因此，对该属性的选择没有任何限制 。The display name is never used by the install utility to identify the service, so there are no restrictions on the choice of name, as there is for the property.

summary.span: 通过向注册表写入服务应用程序信息来安装服务。

span.span: Installs the service by writing service application information to the registry.

summary.span: 该方法旨在由自动处理适当方法的安装工具使用。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which process the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，你不会在 你的代码内调用方法; 通常仅由安装实用工具调用这些方法。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会 在安装过程中自动调用此方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during installation. 如果需要，它会 在生成异常的对象上调用，从而支持故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程会使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components that were already installed, using the project installer's . 作为参数传递到的此状态信息 `stateSaver` 会不断更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information, passed into as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 与项目安装类关联的将安装对项目中的所有实例都通用的信息 。The associated with your project installation class installs information common to all instances in the project. 如果此服务具有与安装项目中的其他服务分隔的任何内容，则此方法会安装该服务特定的信息。If this service has anything that separates it from the other services in the installation project, that service-specific information is installed by this method. 若要安装服务，请创建一个从类继承的项目安装程序类 ，并将 类的特性设置为 `true` 。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from the class, and set the attribute on the class to `true`. 在项目中， 为每个服务应用程序创建一个实例，并 为应用程序中的每个服务创建一个实例。Within your project, create one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 在项目安装程序类构造函数中，使用和实例设置服务的安装 属性 ，并将实例添加到集合中 。Within your project installer class constructor, set the installation properties for the service using the and instances, and add the instances to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 建议使用构造函数来添加安装程序实例;但是，如果需要 在方法中将添加到集合中 ，请确保在方法中对集合执行相同的添加 。It is recommended that you use the constructor for adding installer instances; however, if you need to add to the collection in the method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the method. 对于从类派生的所有类 ，集合的状态 在和方法中必须相同 。For all classes deriving from the class, the state of the collection must be the same in the and methods. 但是， 如果将安装程序实例添加到 自定义安装程序类构造函数中的集合，则可以避免在和方法中维护集合。However, you can avoid the maintenance of the collection across the and methods if you add installer instances to the collection in your custom installer class constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，你不会在 你的代码内调用方法; 通常仅由安装实用工具调用这些方法。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用程序会在 安装过程中自动调用此方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如果需要，它会 在生成异常的对象上调用，从而支持故障。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关已安装组件的信息 。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 作为参数传递到的此状态信息 `savedState` 会不断更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly.

summary.span: 指示系统用于标识此服务的名称。

span.span: Indicates the name used by the system to identify this service.

summary.span: 此属性必须与要安装的服务的 相同。

span.span: This property must be identical to the of the service you want to install.
The name of the service to be installed.

value.span: 该值必须在安装实用工具尝试安装服务以前进行设置。

span.span: This value must be set before the install utility attempts to install the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与从派生的类的相同，这一点非常重要 。It is crucial that the be identical to the of the class you derived from . 通常情况下，服务的 属性的值在服务应用程序的可执行文件的主 ( # A1 函数内设置。Normally, the value of the property for the service is set within the Main() function of the service application's executable. 服务控制管理器使用 属性在此可执行文件中查找服务。The Service Control Manager uses the property to locate the service within this executable. 设置 服务安装程序的时， 关联的事件日志的将设置为相同的值。When you set the of the service installer, the of the associated event log is set to the same value. 这允许服务自动记录 (（例如启动和停止) 调用计算机上的应用程序日志）。This allows the service to automatically log service commands (such as Start and Stop) calls to the Application log on the computer. > [!NOTE] > 如果计算机上已存在具有相同名称的源，但在应用程序日志以外的其他日志中，则将引发异常。If a source by the same name already exists on the computer, but in a log other than the Application log, an exception will be thrown. 如果源存在并且与应用程序日志关联，则该源用于向服务报告命令调用，并且不引发异常。If the source exists and is associated with the Application log, that source is used to report command calls to the service, and no exception is thrown. 不能为 `null` 或长度为零。The cannot be `null` or have zero length. 其最大大小为256个字符。Its maximum size is 256 characters. 它也不能包含正斜杠或反斜杠、"/" 或 " \\ "，也不能包含值小于 decimal 值32的 ASCII 字符集中的字符。It also cannot contain forward or backward slashes, '/' or '\\', or characters from the ASCII character set with value less than decimal value 32.

span.span: The property is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ServicesDependedOn { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.ServicesDependedOn : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 指示为使该服务能够运行而必须正在运行的服务。

span.span: Indicates the services that must be running for this service to run.

value.span: 在与该安装程序关联的服务运行以前必须运行的一组服务。

span.span: An array of services that must be running before the service associated with this installer can run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务可能需要运行其他服务，然后才能启动。A service can require other services to be running before it can start. 此属性中的信息将写入注册表中的密钥。The information from this property is written to a key in the registry. 如果用户 (或系统，在自动启动) 尝试运行服务时，服务控制管理器 (SCM) 验证阵列中的每个服务是否已启动。When the user (or the system, in the case of automatic startup) tries to run the service, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies that each of the services in the array has already been started. 如果阵列中的任何服务未运行，则 SCM 会尝试启动它们。If any service in the array is not running then, the SCM tries to start them. 这包括的服务 `Manual` 。This includes services with `Manual`. 如果此服务所依赖的任何服务无法启动，则此服务将无法启动。If any service upon which this service depends fails to start, this service will not start. 如果系统未启动，则不会引发异常，因为系统级别没有要检测到的异常处理。An exception is not thrown if the system is not started because there is no exception handling at the system level to detect this. 确定如何处理服务启动失败并在代码中实现此操作。Decide how to handle service start failures and implement this in your code. 通常，如果服务无法启动，则会在启动时向用户显示一个对话框。Typically, a dialog appears to the user at startup if a service fails to start. 如果服务未启动，则会向应用程序事件日志中写入一个条目。If the service does not start, an entry is written to the Application event log. 此服务所依赖的服务不需要处于相同的可执行文件中。The services upon which this service depends do not need to be in the same executable.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceProcess::ServiceStartMode StartType { System::ServiceProcess::ServiceStartMode get(); void set(System::ServiceProcess::ServiceStartMode value); };
member this.StartType : System.ServiceProcess.ServiceStartMode with get, set

summary.span: 指示启动此服务的方式和时间。

span.span: Indicates how and when this service is started.
A that represents the way the service is started.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指定在重新启动后服务将不会自动启动。

span.span: The default is , which specifies that the service will not automatically start after reboot.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 以指定在重新启动后自动启动服务或用户必须手动启动服务。Set the to specify either that the service be started automatically after reboot or that a user must manually start the service. 还可以禁用服务，指定它在启用之前无法以手动或编程方式启动。A service can also be disabled, specifying that it cannot be started, either manually or programmatically, until it is enabled. 安装后不能更改 属性值。You cannot change property values after installation. 若要更改 ，则必须卸载并重新安装服务，或者使用 "服务控制管理器" 手动更改设置。To change the , you either have to uninstall and reinstall your service, or manually change the setting using the Service Control Manager.

exception.span: 启动模式不是 枚举的有效值。

span.span: The start mode is not a value of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，包含与安装关联的上下文信息。

span.span: An that contains the context information associated with the installation.

summary.span: 通过从注册表中移除关于服务的信息来卸载服务。

span.span: Uninstalls the service by removing information about it from the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 卸载首先尝试停止服务，然后再卸载它。Uninstall first attempts to stop the service before uninstalling it. 如果无法停止该服务，则不会捕获到异常，并且该方法将继续删除该服务。If the service cannot be stopped, no exception is caught, and the method continues with the removal of the service. 通常情况下，你不会在 你的代码内调用方法; 通常仅由安装实用工具调用这些方法。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. Installutil.exe 用于卸载服务以及安装服务;卸载会在命令行调用中采用开关。InstallUtil is used to uninstall services as well as install them; uninstalling takes a switch in the command line call. 应用程序的卸载例程使用项目安装程序的，自动维护有关正在卸载的组件的信息 。An application's uninstall routine maintains information automatically about the components being uninstalled, using the project installer's . 作为参数传递到的此状态信息 `savedState` 会不断更新为 实例，并且每个 实例由实用工具安装。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 通常不需要让代码显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 对于从类派生的所有类 ，集合的状态 在和方法中必须相同 。For all classes deriving from the class, the state of the collection must be the same in the and methods. 但是， 如果将安装程序实例添加到 自定义安装程序类构造函数中的集合，则可以避免在和方法中维护集合。However, you can avoid the maintenance of the collection across the and methods if you add installer instances to the collection in your custom installer class constructor. 没有用于卸载的回滚机制，因此，如果一个服务无法卸载，则这不会影响通常) 正在卸载的同一安装项目中 (其他服务。There is no rollback mechanism for uninstalling, so if one service fails to uninstall, this does not affect the other services (usually within the same installation project) being uninstalled.

exception.span: 未能打开服务控制管理器。

span.span: The Service Control Manager could not be opened.
-or-

exception.span: 系统未能获取服务的句柄。

span.span: The system could not get a handle to the service.
